response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our exclusive product to you. This unique offering holds significant value to us, and we believe it would also be a great asset for you. We understand its worth to you is approximately $800,000, and based on this assessment, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. We hope this price aligns with your expectations and allows us to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
